name: Community Programs
description: MNRC offers community programs to homeless residents in the 16th street corridor and surrounding Mission neighborhood. Currently, the available programs are: - Ladies’ Day (Thursdays, 6PM to 8PM): a safe and supportive space for biological and transgender females who are homeless or at risk of homelessness. - Weekly support groups: - Harm Reduction group (Wednesdays at 10:45AM) - Art therapy group (Tuesdays at 3PM) - Yoga group (the first and third Wednesdays of the month at 4:30PM) - Blackness,
